headline: How Domino's New Spicy Chicken Bacon Ranch Pizza Launch May Impact Investors in DPZ
summary: On November 10, 2025, Domino's Pizza introduced its Spicy Chicken Bacon Ranch Pizza, expanding its Specialty Pizza lineup to 11 distinct offerings and promoting the launch with a national Mix and Match deal at $9.99 each. This new menu addition is being highlighted through a campaign featuring Retta, as Domino's seeks to maintain momentum following strong third-quarter results that were boosted by product innovation and value-driven promotions. We'll explore how the Spicy Chicken Bacon Ranch...
